title: How to Install Adobe Acrobat Reader

steps.headline: Download the Software by clicking on the Download Button.
Go to the directory, where your downloaded Installation file has been kept, usually Desktop.
Let the Setup File install Adobe Acrobat Reader on your computer.

tyn: An Internet Connection to Download the Installation File.
text: Download Adobe Acrobat Reader.  Download the Software by clicking on the Download Button.  Go to the directory, where your downloaded Installation file has been kept, usually Desktop.  Double-Click the Installation File.  Let the Setup File install Adobe Acrobat Reader on your computer.  Restart your computer.  Start Using the software.
sentences: Download the Software by clicking on the Download Button.
Go to the directory, where your downloaded Installation file has been kept, usually Desktop.
Let the Setup File install Adobe Acrobat Reader on your computer.
